name: 林煜善
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Week	Dates	Contents	Quiz 
W1.	Feb 19-25	Course Introduction	
W2.	Feb 26 - Mar 4	Unit 1 General Business	
W3.	Mar 5 - 11	Unit 2 Manufacturing	Unit 1
W4.	Mar 12 - 18	Unit 3 Finance & Budgeting	Unit 2
W5.	Mar 19 - 25	Unit 4 Corporate Development	Unit 3
W6.	Mar 26 - Apr 1	Unit 5 Offices	Unit 4
W7.	Apr 2 - 8	Unit 6 Personal	Unit 5
W8.	Apr 9 - 15	TOEIC Practice	
W9.	Apr 16 - 22	Midterm	
W10.	Apr 23 - 29	Unit 7 Purchasing	Unit 6
W11.	Apr 30 - May 6	Unit 8 Technical Areas	Unit 7
W12.	May 7 - 13	Unit 9 Housing & Corporate Property	Unit 8
W13.	May 14 - 20	Unit 10 Travel	Unit 9
W14.	May 21 - 27	Unit 11 Dining Out	Unit 10
W15.	May 28 - Jun 3	Unit 12 Entertainment	Unit 11
W16.	Jun 4 - 10	Unit 13 Health	Unit 12
W17.	Jun 11 - 17	Final	
W18.	Jun 18 - 24	TOEIC Practice	Unit 13
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam: 20%
Final Exam: 20%
TOEIC Practice: 20%
Quizzes: 40%
* Bonus: Full attendance  Three of the lowest scores can be excluded.
materials: 新多益13大情境學習指南 (LiveABC)
